messages.body:
FROM EUCHARIA

 3-20-13 afternoon


Dear Sweetheart Alotta,


How are you today, together with your business, hope all is well with
you, actually my late husband names is Mr.John Henrion Slvestrone,
that was why you saw that name there, but please don't remind me of
what i have forgotten......


I wanted to send you this letter because; I think that you need to
know what I am feeling.. And I thought this may be a way to tell you
that you can look back at this letter when you are feeling down and
think of what you mean to me, and how special you are to me.


From the day we started conversation and communicating, I knew you
were my destiny. No man had ever captured my attention so fully or
made my heart skip a beat the way it did. I knew that you would hold
my heart in your hands and you more than do that - you completely own
me and every part of me. When I think of you, my heart is so full of
love and passion for you that I can hardly contain myself.


I think of spending every minute of every day with you and holding you
so close to me. Whenever you think of me, please know that no matter
how many miles separate us now or how much of our lives comes between
us, you are always in my mind and I will never love anyone as much
again. I thank God everyday for bringing us together.


The memories that I have of our relationship is everlasting, I
wouldn't trade them for anything in the world, I would never do
anything to hurt you, You mean more to me than you realize. I am
hoping that one day I can prove all of this to you! I want you for
you!


The miles that lie between us will soon disappear, and we will have
each other always.


I want to spend my whole life with you, loving you and receiving your
love in return. I long to hold you and feel your sweet caress, Even
though we are apart, Now my heart will always be with you. As long as
we have the memories, yesterday remains. As long as we have hope,
tomorrow awaits
and, each day is never a waste and the waiting will prove to be worthwhile.


What further words can describe what we have together Words can no
longer describe it, but rather in feeling and emotion of what we have
for each other. You have always had the key to my heart, and you
inside my heart has made me more than I can ever be. Though the sea
separates us now till that special day, I know we take each breath
with every beat, and always together as one.


Looking forward to hear from you soon.


Yours love,
Eucharia.

FROM EUCHARIA

  THUR 3-21-13  12-58AM


Sweetheart,


Last night In my dreams, I saw you on the pier. The wind was blowing
through your hair, and your eyes held the fading  sunlight. I was
speechless as I watched you leaning against the rail. You are
beautiful, I thought as I saw you, a vision that I could never find in
anyone else. I slowly began to walk toward you, and when you finally
turned to me, I noticed that others had been watching you as well. "Do
you know him?" they asked me in jealous whispers, and as you smiled at
me I simply answered with the truth, "Better than I know
myself.".......lol. Here is my mobile number you can ring me
+447024090624. looking forward to hear from you soon.


Sincerely yours
Eucharia
